text: Potrerillos is a corregimiento in Dolega District, Chiriquí Province, Panama. It has a land area of and had a population of 1,562 as of 2010, giving it a population density of . Its population as of 1990 was 1,157; its population as of 2000 was 1,378. ==References== Category:Corregimientos of Chiriquí Province es:Potrerillos (Chiriquí)
title: Potrerillos, Chiriquí
